Ma. Bernabé sueña con ampliar su local para que sea un negocio establecido y tener personas a su cargo para atenderlo, de esta manera poder asegurar su futuro y el de su familia.
texts.en:
The "Emprendedoras" (Enterprising Women) communal bank is made up of six women with initiative. In fact, they decided to call themselves this, because they consider themselves enterprising women, and want to keep their businesses going.

Bernabé is part of the group. She is 49, married, and the mother of three children, ages 33, 30 and 29.  Approximately 18 years ago, she dreamed about having her own business in order to help her husband, but she couldn't leave her small children alone to go out selling. Currently she has a small grocery store.

Bernabé dreams of expanding her store so that it will be an established business, and of employing people to run it. This way, she will be able to assure her future and that of her family.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for expanding her shop.

loans.name: Zahra

texts.en: Zahra is a 57-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan, and the mother of seven children. Zahra is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture, so the man in the photo is her son. Zahra is looking to improve her family's living conditions so she is requesting a loan of 500 Jordanian dinars to do maintenance on her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Abed Al Raheem

texts.en:
Abed al Raheem is a 54-year-old married man from Al Russeifeh, Jordan and  the father of five children.

Abed al Raheem is looking to improve his family's living conditions so he is requesting a loan of 500 JD to renew his house furnishings.

loans.use: to renew his house furniture

loans.name: Fadya

texts.en:
Fadya is a 31-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of one child. She does handmade embroidery, and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase materials for her business.

Fadya is looking to open a shop for her products to increase her income and expand her customer base.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for her business

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa, de 52 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive desde hace 32 años, junto a Nicolás, su esposo. Ambos tienen 5 hijos, todos menores a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Chilca. Hace algunos años trabajaba en el camal de su localidad, pero por problemas de salud, dejó de laborar. Confiesa que extraña mucho estar activa y contribuir con los gastos del hogar. Ahora su esposo es quien se encarga de laborar en el camal a la espera de su recuperación. Cuenta que en su tiempo s libres y como terapia se dedica a la crianza de animales como ovejas y alpacas de buena calidad, su estilo de trabajo es comprar ganados de raza, para poder mejorar la raza y de esa manera, dentro de 6 meses vender los animales maduros a buen precio. En la ciudad de Huancavelica, donde ella comercializa sus animales, ya la conocen pues es una de las que trae animales de mejor calidad. Eso le gusta mucho, sobre todo porque tiene muchos años dedicándose a este negocio, “Siento que es un merecido homenaje a mi trabajo y pasión por los animales”, comenta Luisa. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “San Fernando”, este es el crédito número dieciséis con MFP, y se siente feliz, pues encontró la ayuda que tanto necesitaba, para emprender sus objetivos. Además es responsable en todas sus labores, por ello promete ser puntual en los pagos. Luisa de recibir su apoyo, aprovechará la temporada de precios bajos de ganado ovino. Piensa comprar ovejas machos, para aumentar sus ganados.
texts.en:
Luisa is 52 years old and is a working woman. She has been living with her husband Nicolás for 32 years. Together they have 5 children, all minors, who they look after in their home located in the town of Chilca. 

Some years ago Luisa worked in the abattoir in her town, but because of her health she stopped working. She admits that she really misses working and contributing to the household income. It is now her husband goes about working in the abattoir until she gets better. Luisa speaks of how in her spare time, and as a means of therapy, she breeds high-quality animals such as sheep and alpacas. Her style of working is to buy livestock in order to improve the breed and in that way, within 6 months sell the mature animals at a good price. 

In the city of Huancavelica, where she sells her animals, she is already known for being amongst those who bring better quality animals. That pleases her a lot, particularly as she has spent many years working in this business. “I feel that it is a true homage to my work and passion for animals”, says Luisa. 

She belongs to the “San Fernando” solidarity group, and this is the sixteenth loan with Microfinanzas Prismas. She feels happy as she has found the help that she really needed to meet her objectives. Moreover, she is responsible in all that she does, which is why she promises to make her repayments on time. With your help, Luisa will make the most of the season of low prices for sheep. She is thinking of buying rams to increase her flock.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Omayma

texts.en:
Omayma is a conservative person and she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet so the man in the photo is her son. She is a 51-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan and a mother of three children.

Omayma is looking to improve her family's living conditions, and she is requesting a loan of 2000 JD to help with her son's marriage expenses.

loans.use: to assist her son with his marriage expenses

loans.name: Faeda

texts.en:
Faeda is a 31-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Amman, Jordan and a mother of three children.

Faeda is looking to improve her family's living conditions so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do maintenance on her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en: Abeer is a 30-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and the mother of one child. She is a tailor and is requesting a loan of 500 Jordanian dinars to purchase a new sewing machine. Abeer is looking to improve her family's living conditions and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Fatimah

texts.en:
Fatimah is a 37-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan and a mother of seven children.

Fatimah is looking to improve her family's living conditions so she is requesting a loan of 1000 JD to do maintenance on her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Eman

texts.en: Eman makes handmade embroideries. She is requesting a loan of 600 Jordanian dinars to purchase materials needed for her business. Eman is a 47-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and the mother of four children. Eman is looking to open a shop to better display her products and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase embroidery materials

loans.name: Safeyeh

texts.en: Safeyeh is a 34-year-old marred woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan, and the mother of three children. Safeyeh is looking to improve her family's living conditions. She is requesting a loan of 600 Jordanian dinars to do maintenance on her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Fawzeyeh

texts.en: Fawzeyeh is a 37-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan. Fawzeyeh is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet, so the man in the photo is her father. Fawzeyeh is looking to improve her family's living conditions so she is requesting a loan of 500 Jordanian dinars to do maintenance on her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Cruz Rosendo

texts.es:
El señor Cruz Rosendo es soltero, tiene 19 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica a la confección de pants de diferente colores y tamaños, inicio este trabajo como operario y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de tejidos, compra de telas para la confección de pants, ya que espera ver su negocio grande y con mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Cruz Rosendo is single 19-year-old. He didn't have the opportunity to study; he earns his living making tracksuits in different colors and different sizes. He started this job as a worker, and to date he has 3 years of experience. 

He seeks a loan which he will use to buy fabrics, to buy materials to make tracksuits as he hopes to see his business become big and with better profits.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Suyapa

texts.es:
Maria Suyapa tiene 57 años, es divorciada y tiene una hija de 19 años la cual esta estudiando en la universidad, vive en una colonia de Chamelecón, San Pedro Sula Cortes.
Doña Maria desde hace 9 años de dedica a la venta de comida.  Inicio este negocio hace 7 años impulsada por obtener los recursos para el sostenimiento de su familia aunque cuenta con la ayuda del padre de su hija necesitaba un ingreso extra para solventar los gastos del hogar y el estudio de su hija.  Manifiesta que su clientela esta en la misma colonia por la cual le va bien vendiendo sus alimentos y cuenta con la ayuda de otra persona para dar un servicio de calidad a los clientes. Ha logrado sostener este negocio con mucho trabajo y también gracias a los financiamientos que ODEF le ha proporcionado ha prosperado mucho su calidad de vida y esta mejor que antes. Vende  almuerzos, baleadas, jugos, refrescos y golosinas. atiende a sus clientes  desde las 6.00 am hasta las 4.00 pm.
Actualmente esta solicitando el préstamo numero 26 y es por un monto de 18,000 lempiras y lo necesita para abastecerse de productos para la elaboración de sus comidas para la venta como ser, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, harina, carnes, condimentos, refrescos, golosinas entre otros.
Su meta es extenderse mas en el negocio, logrando obtener el capital necesario para ayudar a su hija a graduarse en la universidad, y contratar una segunda persona en el negocio para abarcar la demanda de los clientes.
texts.en:
Maria Suyapa is 57 years old and divorced.  She has a 19 year old daughter who is studying at the university.  She lives in the Chamelecón neighborhood in San Pedro Sula, Cortes

Maria has been selling food for nine years.  She started this business seven years ago.  She was driven to get income to support her family.  Even though she has help from the father of her daughter, she needed extra income to pay for the household expenses and her daughter’s education. 

She says that her clientele is from her neighborhood.  Therefore, selling her food is going well for her.  She has help from another person in order to provide her customers with quality service.  She has managed to sustain this business with a lot of work.  Also, thanks to the loans that ODEF has given her, she has a much better quality of life and is better than before.  She sells lunches, “baleadas” (flour tortillas with beans, eggs, butter, cheese and meat), juices, soft drinks and sweets.  She waits on her customers from 6:00 a.m. until 4:00 p.m.

The loan she is requesting for 18,000 lempiras is her 26th loan.  She needs it to stock up on products to make the meals that she sells.  She will buy things like rice, beans, sugar, flour, meat, condiments, soft drinks, and sweets, among others.  

Her goal is to expand her business.  Then she would manage to get the money that is needed for her daughter to graduate from the university.  Her goal is also to hire a second person in the business in order to meet the customers’ demand.

loans.use: to buy things like rice, beans, sugar, flour, meat, condiments, soft drinks, and sweets, among others to make her food.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy personal products and therefore be able to set up her own business without any middlemen.

loans.name: Glendy Yamileth

texts.es:
Glendy tiene 21 años de edad, esta acompañada y es madre de una hija. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de la canasta básica desde hace seis años. Aprendio esta actividad de una prima que es para ella como una hermana y es quien la impulso. Glendy vio que vendía bastante y por esa razón instalo su propia tienda.

Para ir a comprar los productos, ella viaja en el pick up de la suegra hasta la ciudad, sale a las 4:00 a.m. y regresa a las 11:00 a.m.

Ella solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar una plancha para elaborar pupusas y terminar una habitación para instalar ahí la tienda, ya que ha estado alquilando todo este tiempo. Con la compra de la plancha, ella tendrá un nuevo ingreso e incrementara las ventas, recibiendo más ganancias, mejorando su calidad de vida y ofreciéndole un mejor futuro a su hija.

Glendy tendrá una estabilidad económica, que le permitirá proporcionarle un mejor futuro a su hija y ella se siente una madre muy satisfecha de poder darle todo lo necesario a su hija. Ella desea con la ayuda de Dios ahorrar para comprar su propio vehiculo, así se movilizara personalmente, surtirá más la tienda y tendrá mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Glendy is 21, lives with her partner, and is the mother of a daughter. She has been selling basic household products for six years.  She learned this business from a cousin who is like a sister to her and is the one who motivated her. Glendy saw that she sold quite a bit, and that is why she set up her own store.

To go to buy her products, she travels to the city in her mother-in-law's pick-up. She leaves at 4:00am and returns at 11:00am.

She is applying to Fundación Campo for a loan to buy a grill for making pupusas (grilled stuffed corn cakes) and to finish a room, in order to set up her store there, as she has been renting all this time. With the purchase of the grill, she will have a new source of income and increase her sales; earning more profits, improving her quality of life, and providing a better future for her daughter.

Glendy will have financial stability that will allow her to provide a better future for her daughter, and she will feel very satisfied as a mother, able to give her daughter everything she needs. With God's help, she wishes to save for buying her own vehicle. This way she will be able to get around by herself. She will stock the store more and will have better earnings.

loans.use: To buy a grill for making pupusas (grilled stuffed corn cakes), and to finish a room for setting up her store in.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, de 28 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Aldo, su esposo desde hace 8 años. En todo este tiempo criaron de su pequeña hija, Fiorela. A la que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Huachac. Su principal ingreso económico, constan de la siembra de papa, zanahoria, maíz y habas, las cuales siembra en sus propios terrenos agrícolas. Cuenta que en cada cosecha los comercializa en la capital del país, donde obtiene un mejor ingreso económico, pues el precio de demanda es mayor. En ocasiones, cuando lava la zanahoria en el río, los mismos compradores recogen sus cosechas para comercializarlos. Ya que se ven ricas y sobre todo saludables. Pero su otro ingreso económico se centra en la crianza de vacas, posee 6; las cuales le brindan la leche necesaria para elaborar yogurt natural, a la semana realiza un promedio de 100 litros. Cuenta que su secreto está en la mantención de los animales, pues los nutre, alimenta con comida balanceada, además de ofrecerles una asistencia técnica una vez al mes. “Tengo que cuidarlos para obtener buenos resultados”, comenta. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Los lirios” y este es el séptimo crédito con MFP, y se siente feliz, pues encontró la ayuda que tanto necesitaba, para emprender sus objetivos. Además es responsable en todas sus labores, por ello promete ser puntual en los pagos.
Elizabeth de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de semilla de alfalfa y un cerco para que sus animales puedan comer con tranquilidad.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 28, is a hardworking woman. She lives with Aldo, her husband of 8 years. During this time they have been raising their small daughter, Fiorela, in their own home located in the town of Huachac. Their principal income comes from their harvests of potatoes, carrots, corn and broad beans, which they plant on their own land.

Elizabeth notes that she sells each crop in the capital of the country where she obtains a better price, since the demand is greater. At times when she is washing the carrot harvest in the river, those same buyers collect the crops to market them, since they are delicious and above all healthy.

Elizabeth’s other income derives from cattle raising. She has 6 cows which provide enough milk to make natural yourt. She produces on average 100 liters a week. She says that her secret is in her treatment of the animals; she nurtures them, feeds them nutritionally balanced feed and also provides them with expert care once a month. “I have to take care of them in order to have good results,” she notes. 

She belongs to Los Lirios communal bank and this is her seventh loan from MFP. She is happy because she found the help she urgently needed in order to meet her objectives. Also, she is responsible in everything she does and promises to be punctual in making her payments.

Upon receiving your support, she will use the money to buy alfalfa seeds and pay for a fence so that the animals can feed safely.

loans.use: to purchase alfalfa seeds and a fence.

loans.name: Erasmus

texts.en:
Erasmus is a 30-year old married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda.  He has owned a produce store for two years now. He started with 300,000 Ugandan shillings and now it's worth 1,500,000 Ugandan shillings.  Despite the fact that he is progressing, he is challenged by price fluctuations, inflation and seasonal changes.  Erasmus needs this loan to buy maize products for resale.

His desire is to buy a motorcycle and expand his business to become a big renowned produce store in Kamwenge.

loans.use: to buy maize products for resale.

loans.name: Tagana

texts.en:
Tagana is a 31 year-old businessman, who lives in Juba. He is married and has 6 children between the ages of 15 and 4 years.  All of them go to school. 
Tagana runs a utensils business, and he has been in the business for 9 years.  He has one employee. Tagana heard about Finance South Sudan from a  radio advertisement as well as marketing and promotion done in the market by the officers.  He is taking a loan of 1500SDG to purchase more items like glass plates, glass cups, spoons, flasks and many others.  Tagana has no other source of income. 

In 5 years time, Tagana would like to build a good house and open another shop.  His major challenges include bringing the utensils from another country to South Sudan, since the new nation has no factory for utensils.
 
Tagana says that he has a lot of appreciation for Finance South Sudan for supporting him with additional capital for the business.  He was able to add to the stock.

loans.use: to purchase more items like, glass plates, glass cups, spoons, flasks and many others.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 39-year-old married man living near the town of Waterloo - the eastern area of Freetown, Sierra Leone. He has 2 children, ranging in age from 10 years to 16 years old, both of them currently attending school.

Ibrahim has been running his business for 18 years now, and sells bulgur, gari, palm oil and beans. His primary income comes from renting out a house. He also sells palm oil and goat on occasion. He says that lately the main challenge to his business is transportation cost.

Ibrahim has a successful history with BRAC, previously completing 1 loan. He has now requested this loan to buy more local food products such as bulgur, palm oil, gari and beans. He says that the extra income from this loan will help him to continue educating his children up to the university level.

Ibrahim has plans for expansion in the next 5-10 years, and his main goal is to build more stores and supply his customers. He says this will enable him to improve his status.

loans.use: to  buy more local food product such as bulgur, palm oil, gari and beans.

loans.name: Rayda

texts.es: Rayda tiene 35 años, vive con su esposo Moisés y sus 6 hijos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Chilca. Desde su niñez se ha dedicado a las tareas del campo, trabaja todos los días para dedicarse a la agricultura desde horas de la madrugada  para ver que sus terrenos estén en muy buen estado, también tiene animales como ovejas vacas y cerdos que lleva a pastear en el campo, en estas tareas toda su familia es participe principalmente su esposo ya que de esto depende  bastante los ingresos de su hogar, se siente muy alentada de seguir adelante por lo que ha decidido  mejorar mas en sus cultivos con semillas mejoradas ya que en la actualidad  sus cosechas han compensado el esfuerzo que ha realizado aunque siempre exista el riesgo de perdida de sus cosechas por condiciones climáticas. Es su segundo crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero y  le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su actividad. Rayda de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de animales para poder engordarlos.
texts.en:
Rayda is 35, and lives with her husband Moisés and their six children in their own house, located in Chilca. Since childhood, she has worked in the fields. As a farmer, she works every day from the dawn hours, to see that her land is in very good condition. She also has animals such as sheep, pigs and cows, that she takes out to graze in the countryside.  

Her entire family participates in these tasks, but mainly her husband, since the household income depends quite a bit on this. She feels very encouraged about moving forward, so she has decided to further improve her crops with enhanced seed. Currently, her harvests have repaid the effort she has made, although the risk of losing the harvest always exists, because of weather conditions. 

This is her second loan with MFP, and she is very happy to know that she has financial support. She is pleased to be part of her group, because all the members are responsible people and very supportive. She is grateful to those people that will be administering the loan she is applying for, and it will be very useful in helping her business progress. 

When she receives the loan, Rayda will use the money applied for to buy animals to be able to fatten them.

loans.use: To buy animals.

loans.name: Reem

texts.en: Reem is a 34-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan, and the mother of six children. Reem is looking to improve her family's living conditions. She is requesting a loan of 400 Jordanian dinars to do maintenance on her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Mustapha

texts.en:
Mustapha is a 38-year-old married man living in eastern, Sierra Leone, near the town of Waterloo. He has 3 children, ranging in age from 8 years to 18 years old. All of them currently attend school.

Mustapha has been running his business for over 20 years now, and sells pepper, palm oil, ground nuts and beans. His primary income comes from the sale of palm oil, while he also sells local chickens on occasion. He says that lately the main challenge to his business is transportation costs. Mustapha has a successful history with BRAC, having repaid one loan. He has requested this loan to buy more bags of rice, palm oil and ground nuts. He says that the extra income from this loan will help him improve his financial conditions. Mustapha has plans for expansion in the next 5-10 years, and his main goal is to buy a commercial vehicle. He says this will enable him to expand more.

loans.use: To buy more bags of rice, palm oil and ground nuts

loans.name: Rev Kenso   K

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 49-year-old Rev Kenso from Grassfield. He is married with 4 children between the ages of 11 years and 23 years. Rev Kenso's children attend school. 

Rev Kenso runs a general store, where he sells bags of rice, flour, sugar and other provisions. He has been running this business for 9 years. He works at the business 26 days per month. His family's other source of income comes from his wife who is a teacher. Rev Kenso has 2 employees working for him. Rev Kenso says that the main challenges to his business are rats and price inflation.

Rev Kenso has requested a loan in order to buy more food commodities such as bags of rice, flour, and sugar. The extra income from this loan will allow him to improve his family's status. In the future, he plans to grow and expand his business. He thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy more food commodities such as bags of rice, flour, and sugar.

loans.name: Harfiz

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 39-year-old Harfiz from Calabatown, Sierra Leone. He is married with four children between the ages of five months and twelve years. Three of his children currently attend school. 

Harfiz runs a general store; he sells provisions such as milk, sugar, sardines, cocoa, and cream. He has been running this business for one year. Previously he was working in security. When the company closed, he decided to start a business.  He works at the store seven days a week. His business is his only source of income. Harfiz says that the main challenge to his business is transportation costs.

Harfiz has requested a loan in order to buy more provisions to sell. The extra income from this loan will allow him to educate his children. In the future, he plans to expand his business. He thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase more provisions for his store.

loans.name: Maricela Maria

texts.es:
Maricela es una persona que a pesar de las grandes adversidades que le ha presentado la vida, ha tenido la fortaleza para superarlas y seguir adelante con su vida. Maricela es una madre soltera de 3 hijos menores de edad a quienes su padre abandonó hace un tiempo sin aportar económicamente para su sostenimiento, por lo que Maricela ha tenido que hacer grandes esfuerzos para poder sostener los gastos que se generan en su hogar. Con el ánimo de mejorar su condición económica, Maricela montará un negocio de venta de prendas de vestir con el cual podrá generar ingresos para su hogar y así ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. Maricela busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de prendas de vestir para comenzar su negocio y poder ofrecer a sus clientes una gran variedad de productos.

Maricela espera que de esta manera su negocio pueda salir adelante y sus hijos puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas. Maricela tiene el sueño de tener un gran negocio en el cual pueda ofrecer una gran variedad de productos a sus clientes y desde el cual pueda generar empleo para las personas que se encuentran en situaciones similares a las suyas y así poder mejorar la calidad de vida de diferentes personas.
texts.en:
Maricela is a person that, in spite of the great difficulties life has thrown at her, has had the strength to overcome and get on with her life. She is a single mother of three minor children; the father abandoned them after a time without contributing economically for their support. That's why Maricela has had to put forth great effort in order to handle the expenses of her household. 

With the intention of improving her economic status, Maricela will open a clothing business, which will generate income for her household. In this way she'll be able to offer her children a better quality of life. She expects the loan will give her the opportunity to buy clothing to start her business, so that she can offer her customers a wide variety of products. 

Maricela hopes that in this way her business will be able to move forward and that her children will be able to enjoy a better quality of life and better economic opportunities. Her dream is to have a large business where she can offer a wide variety of goods to her customers, and that she'll be able to offer jobs to people she meets in situations similar to hers, thereby improving the quality of life for other people.

loans.use: to buy clothing to start her business, so that she can offer her customers a wide variety of goods.

loans.name: Osman

texts.en:
This is 47-year-old Osman from Waterloo, Sierra Leone. He is married with 4 children between the ages of 12 years and 21 years. Osman's children are currently attending school.

Osman runs a local food store; he sells onions, gari, pepper, and palm oil. He has been running this business for 12 years. He works at the business from 7:30 a.m. until 6:30 p.m., 7 days per week. He also earns income from a small-scale farm. He says that the main challenge to his business is weather conditions: during the rainy season, sales are slow.

Osman has requested a loan in order to buy more food commodities to sell. The extra income from this loan will allow him to educate his children. In the future, he plans to be a supplier. He appreciates your support.

loans.use: to buy more food commodities such as onions, gari, pepper, and palm oil.

loans.name: Alex Fernando

texts.es:
Sin mucho capital Alex montó una tienda general hace aproximadamente 5 años con la que buscaba generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar donde convive con su esposa y su hijo de 4 años de edad. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece, a la buena calidad de sus productos y a las ganas de salir adelante que tiene Alex, su negocio se ha posicionado y ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes que le permiten tener unas buenas ventas mensuales. Alex, con su negocio, ha podido mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y ofrecerles mejores oportunidades económicas. Su negocio ha ido creciendo cada vez más y es por esto que ahora busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar con los que pueda ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes y así aumentar sus ventas.

Alex espera que su negocio salga adelante y le siga permitiendo ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Además, Alex sueña con tener en un futuro un gran supermercado donde pueda generar empleo para las personas que más lo requieren.
texts.en:
Alex opened a general store without a lot capital approximately 5 years ago. He sought to generate the necessary income to support his home, where he lives with his wife and four year old son. Thanks to the good service he he offers, the good quality of his products and the drive Alex has to get ahead, his business has been able to attract a large number of customers that bring him good monthly sales.  With his business, Alex has been able to improve his family's quality of life, and offer them better financial opportunities. His business has grown more and more and that is why he is seeking a loan to have the possibility of being able to buy basic family basket products in order to offer his customers a wider variety of products and thus increase his sales.  

Alex hopes that his business will get ahead to allow him to offer his family a better quality of life. Alex also dreams of having a big supermarket in the future where he can generate jobs for the people who need it the most.

loans.use: to buy basic family basket products in order to offer a wider variety of products to his customers and thus increase his sales.

loans.name: Maria Libia

texts.es:
Marta inició realizando trabajos de confección y tejidos con los cuales generaba ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar, sin embargo, al ver las necesidades del mercado abrió una tienda general donde ofrece toda clase de productos de la canasta familiar. Marta en su tienda ha tenido el reconocimiento de ofrecer muy buenos productos y brindar una muy buena atención, lo que le ha permitido tener una gran cantidad de clientes y garantizar muy buenas ventas. Marta tiene la dificultad de que debe cuidar de su padre, quien se encuentra muy enfermo y de avanzada edad, y esto hace que su negocio no lo pueda tener abierto durante el tiempo que ella quisiera esté abierto para los clientes. A pesar de esto, la buena reputación de su negocio ha hecho que sus clientes le generen buenas ventas y su negocio crezca poco a poco con el paso del tiempo. Debido a que en su tienda no cuenta con un refrigerador en el cual pueda ofrecer productos que requieran de refrigeración, Marta busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de un refrigerador y poder así ofrecer productos que requieran de refrigeración.

Marta espera que de esta manera su negocio crezca cada vez más y pueda mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Marta sueña con tener un gran negocio que le garantice grandes ingresos y de esta manera pueda evitar las dificultades económicas que se le han presentado y poder seguir progresando en la vida.
texts.en:
Marta started doing sewing and weaving to generate income to support her home. When she saw the need in the market she opened a general store where she offers all types of products for the basic family basket. In her store, Marta is known for offering very good products and offering very good service. This has allowed her to have a lot of customers and guarantee good sales. Marta has the difficulty of having to take care of her father. He is very ill and elderly. This prevents her from keeping her business open all the time she would like to for her customers. Despite this, her business' good reputation has made her customers bring good sales and her business grow little by little over time. Due to the fact that her business doesn't have a refrigerator for refrigerated products, Marta is seeking a loan to have the opportunity to purchase a refrigerator and be able to offer refrigerated products.    

Marta hopes that this will make her business grow even more and help her improve her and her family's quality of life. Marta dreams of having a big business that will guarantee good income and thus avoid the financial difficulties she has encountered and be able to keep progressing in life.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator so she can offer products that require refrigeration.

loans.name: Angela Yaneth

texts.es:
Angela siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy dedicada a su trabajo y siempre querer ofrecer mejores oportunidades para su familia. Angela se encuentra casada y tiene 3 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido poder ofrecer una educación de calidad y un crecimiento adecuado. Angela por medio de su padre aprendió la actividad del alquiler de inflables y brincos, y posteriormente montó su propio negocio con el cual trabaja todos los días y contribuye económicamente para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Angela presenta la dificultad de no contar con un capital que le permita crecer su negocio al ritmo que el mercado se lo exige, sin embargo, ha venido haciendo grandes esfuerzos para poder salir adelante y superar estas dificultades. Es por esto que Angela busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una mesa de brincos con la cual pueda seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes un atractivo servicio.

Angela espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá atender requerimientos de sus clientes que por el bajo capital con el que cuenta no ha sido posible. Angela sueña con tener un gran negocio desde el cual sus 3 hijos tengan una estabilidad económica y el acceso a una mejor educación.
texts.en:
Angela has always been known to be a person who is dedicated to her work and always wants to offer better opportunities to her family. Angela is married and has 3 children, and she has always wanted to be able to offer them a good education and good upbringing.

Angela learned from her father the activity of renting children's inflatable party bounce houses and then she started her own business and works every day and contributes economically towards the upkeep of her home. Angela tells of the difficulty of not having enough working capital to permit her to grow her business at the pace the market demands, however, she has been putting forth great effort to get ahead and overcome these difficulties.

This is why Angela is looking for a loan to give her the possibility of being able to buy a selection of inflatable bounce houses with which she can continue offering her clients an attractive service.

Angela hopes that in this way her income will considerably increase, and she will be able to satisfy the wishes of her customers which she has not been able to do for lack of funds. Angela’s dream is to have a big business from which her 3 children can have economic stability and be able to access a better education.

loans.use: to buy a selection of children's inflatable party bounce houses in order to continue offering her customers an attractive service

loans.name: Ty

texts.en:
Ty, 60 years old, has been a hardworking farmer for almost 13 years. She aims to improve her rice farming business to support her only children. She wants him to earn a degree so that he might have a good job in the future.
To improve her daily household income, Ty is seeking for additional capital from HKL and Kiva to buy fruits to sell. She hopes to be able to make a sustainable living for her family. In the future, Ty wants to renovate and decorate her old house when she has enough savings.

loans.use: to buy fruit for sale.

loans.name: Srey Nat

texts.en:
Srey Nat, 33, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over three years, earning approximately USD 1 per day. Her husband runs the business of buying pigs to resell and earns about USD 5 per day. 

In order to improve their business, Srey Nat is requesting a loan of USD 500 to raise capital for their business for purchasing more pigs to resell. This loan will enable them to generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get a Bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she plans to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and stronger to provide comfortable living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to raise capital for their business to purchase more pigs to resell

loans.name: In

texts.en:
In is 50 years old and is married with four children; she resides in the Baray district of the Kompong Tom province. She has been managing a farming business for over 20 years. She is very conscientious in her daily business activities. Her spouse also works in the same type of business and helps maintain their rice field. In addition to farming rice, In built a room for growing edible mushrooms. 

In is seeking her second loan through HKL to pay for rice cultivation. In the coming years, she wants to expand her business to earn a higher income and save some of it for family emergencies.

loans.use: to cultivate rice.

loans.name: Jhon

texts.es: Jhon de 34 años de edad convive con Nancy de 31 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 3 hijos, ellos viven  en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Pichari. Jhon, es un hombre muy bondadoso, él se dedica a prestar servicio de taxi. Su trabajo rutinario es despertarse muy de madrugada ya que está afiliado a una línea de transportes donde cada trabajador tiene que esperar su turno para salir y realizar el servicio. Jhon ya lleva 7 años realizando ésta actividad con total normalidad, aunque 2 veces ha cambiado de vehículo, pues empezó con un auto de segunda, con lo que logró reunir buen capital, llegando a comprarse uno nuevo. Ahora Jhon esta contento y feliz con su nuevo carro así  com también del trabajo que realiza. En adelante está pensando abrir una tienda de abarrotes para que su esposa pueda encargarse de este nuevo negocio y generar un ingreso para el sostén de la familia. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que jhon se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles comprará mercadería para expender en su nueva tienda.
texts.en: Jhon, 34, lives with Nancy, 31, and together they have 3 children.  They live in their own home, located in the Pichari district.  Jhon is a very kind-hearted man who works as a taxi driver.  His work routine is to get up very early, because he is affiliated with a transportation line where each worker must wait his turn to go out and provide taxi services.  Jhon has been doing this work successfully for 7 years, although he has had to change vehicles twice.  He started out with a second-hand car, and with it he managed to save money and eventually buy a new car.  Now Jhon is content and happy with his new car, and he is also happy with the work that he does.  Going forward, he plans to open a grocery store that his wife will manage to generate more income to support the family.  This is his first loan with MFP, and so Jhon is committed to making his payments on time.  With the 3,000 Peruvian soles he requests, he will buy merchandise to sell in his new store.

loans.use: to buy products to stock his new store

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
La señora Raquel solicita un préstamo para surtir su negocio de abarrotes y que le esta haciendo falta mercancía, como es productos de lata, verduras, frutas, lactaos y carnes frías. Pero no cuentan con el capital necesario para la inversión y no quiere descapitalizar el ingreso de su negocio ya que es la fuente de ingreso para su familia. 
Doña Raquel desea darles lo mejor a sus tres hijos que tiene bajo su responsabilidad, con esta inversión su negocio tendrá más ventas e ingreso, y podrá darle el estudio necesario para que tengan un futuro mejor.
texts.en: Raquel is requesting a loan to stock up her grocery store, because it is currently low on merchandise.  She will buy products such as canned goods, vegetables, fruit, dairy products and cold cuts.  She lacks the capital needed for this investment, and she doesn't want to draw capital from her business earnings because she needs these earnings as a source of income for her family.  Raquel wants to provide the best for her three children who are in her care.  With this investment her business will have more sales and will generate more income, and so she will be able to provide her children with the education they need to have a better future.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store

loans.name: Hector Antonio

texts.es:
Hector se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 30 años a las actividades del campo, donde tiene una vaca a la cual la ordeña y vende la leche y de esta manera genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus 7 hijos. Hector siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y siempre buscar salir adelante con su familia, cualidad que le ha permitido superar grandes adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida. Con el ánimo de seguir creciendo en su negocio, Hector busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una vaca lechera con la cual pueda aumentar su capacidad de producción y atender la demanda del mercado.

Hector espera que de esta manera sus ingresos mensuales aumenten considerablemente, pues así podrá atender los pedidos de sus clientes que antes por poca capacidad debía rechazar. Además, Hector espera que con mayores ingresos su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Hector has been working in agriculture for approximately 30 years, and has a cow that he milks. He sells the milk, and this way generates the income to support his household, consisting of himself, his wife and their seven children.

Hector has always been known for being very hard-working and for always seeking to move forward, together with his family. These qualities have  allowed him to overcome great adversity that has arisen in his life.  

With the aim of seeing his business continue to grow, Hector is seeking a loan that will offer him the chance to purchase a dairy cow. This will enable him to increase his production capacity and meet market demand.

Hector hopes that this way his monthly income will increase considerably, as he will be able to fill customer orders that before, because of limited capacity, he had to reject. As well, Hector hopes that with greater income, his family can enjoy a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities so that they can progress.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow, so that he can increase his production capacity and meet market demand.

loans.name: Memunatu

texts.en:
Meet 42-year-old Memunatu from Grassfield (eastern area) in Freetown. She is divorced from her husband, because she cannot give him a male child.  Memunatu has two children between the ages of eleven and fourteen. Her children are currently attending school. In 2008, Memunatu established her general merchandise business. 

She began her business, because she needed a permanent source of income to support her family, after divorcing from her husband. Her business is the only source of income she has, and she works there six days per week. She says that the main challenges to her business are shortages of goods and price fluctuations.

Memunatu requires a loan in order to buy more food commodities such as bags of rice, salt, Maggi cubes, biscuits and mayonnaise. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her daughters up to the university level. In the future, Memunatu plans to expand her business further. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more food commodities such as bags of rice, salt, Maggi cubes and biscuits.

loans.name: Jhonny Alberto

texts.es:
Jhonny es un joven emprendedor que desde muy corta edad ha aprovechado el conocimiento de sus padres para empezar a trabajar, generar sus propios ingresos y montar su propio negocio. Desde hace aproximadamente 5 años, este joven de 21 años aprendió la actividad del cultivo de verduras, y desde entonces ha venido ejerciendo esta actividad con una gran capacidad para trabajar. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos decidió montar su propio negocio y actualmente cultiva y comercializa sus productos a parte del cultivo de sus padres. La gran dificultad que presenta Jhonny es la falta de capital para poder comprar los insumos que requiere en su cultivo y sacarlo adelante. Es por esto que Jhonny busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de abonos, riegos, fungicidas e insecticidas con los cuales pueda sacar su cultivo adelante.

Jhonny espera que de esta manera pueda seguir generando los ingresos con los cuales pueda prosperar por su propia cuenta y en un futuro pueda ofrecer a sus padres la oportunidad de descansar y no seguir trabajando arduas jornadas de trabajo.
texts.en:
Jhonny is a young entrepreneur who, from an early age, has used his parents' knowledge to start working in order to generate his own income and start his own business. For the past five years, this 21-year-old learned to grow vegetables and since then has been practicing his skills with a great capacity for work. Thanks to the high quality of his products, he decided to start his own business and now grows and sells his products as part of his parents' crops.

The biggest difficulty Jhonny has is a lack of capital to be able to buy materials necessary to move his business forward. It is for this reason that Jhonny is seeking a loan to bring him opportunity to access fertilizers, irrigation, fungicides, and insecticides with which to improve his growing. Jhonny hopes that he can continue generating income with which to prosper on his own and in the future be able to offer his parents the opportunity to rest and not have to work long and hard hours.

loans.use: Compra de abonos, riegos, fungicidas e insecticidas con los cuales pueda sacar su cultivo adelante.

loans.name: Luchando Por El Futuro Group

texts.es: Doña Reina es miembro del Grupo Solidario Luchando por el Futuro, tiene 53 años de edad, es madre de 4 hijos los cuales son estudiantes, es casada su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y al comercio. Hace algunos años doña Reina inicio con una pulpería pero dejo ese negocio para dedicarse a la venta de ropa y calzado y desde hace seis años se dedica a este rubro, trabaja en conjunto con su esposo y sus hijos,  son una familia muy unida y luchadora. Una de sus ventajas es que el negocio tiene muy buena ubicacion y tiene mucha clientela, su horario de atención es de 7:00 am a 7:00 pm. El préstamo que doña Reina solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de ropa y calzado con estilos nuevos y que estén a la moda para poder llamar la atención de sus clientes y así aumentar sus ventas para obtener mayores ingresos que le ayuden al sustento de su familia. Una de sus metas es tener un local más amplio para darles una mejor atención a sus clientes. Con los prestamos que ha obtenido doña Reina su negocio a progresado mucho y sus condiciones de vida han mejorado. Doña Reina ha tenido seis créditos con FAMA y ha cancelado puntualmente sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Reina is a member of the lending group "Luchando por el Futuro" [Fighting for the Future]. She is 53 and a mother of 4 children who are in school. Her husband works in agriculture and commerce. Some years ago Reina started a small grocery store but she left that business in order to focus on clothing and shoe sales, which she has been doing for six years. She works together with her husband and kids - they are a very united and hardworking family. One of the advantages of her business is good location and a good clientele base. She is open from 7am to 7pm.

Reina asked for a loan to invest in the purchase of clothing and footwear in new, fashionable styles so that she can draw in her customers and increase her sales so she makes more profits to sustain her family. One of her goals is to have a bigger store so she can give her customers better attention. With her previous loans, Reina's business has progressed a lot and her living conditions have improved. Reina has had 6 loans with FAMA and has paid them back on time.

loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear.

loans.name: Emiliano

texts.es:
Emiliano, de 35 años de edad casado con virginia de 30 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 4 hijos. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicado en la asociación vista alegre del distrito de Sivia. Emiliano consecuente con sus objetivos, él se dedica al cultivo de café y cacao en su parcela agrícola ubicado en la comunidad de chuvivana  desde hace 11 años, mientras que su querida esposa se dedica a la venta de abarrotes.
Emiliano trabaja sembrando cacao, para ello necesita la ayuda de 2 peones permanentes que siempre trabajan para él. Actualmente cuenta ya con 6 hectáreas de cacao del que gracias a su dedicación, su cosecha anual da un promedio de 2,500 Kg., de cacao, cantidad del cual se siente orgulloso, y asimismo entusiasmado en seguir incrementando más plantas de cacao.  Este es su cuarto crédito con MFP, por el que él se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cotas. Él esta alegre por tener un banco comunal bien unido.
Con los 3, 500 nuevos soles incrementará más cultivos de cacao, para ello comprará más plantas y contratará peones.
texts.en:
Emiliano, 35, is married to Virginia, 30, and they have four children from this relationship.  They live together in their own house located in the Vista Alegre neighborhood of the district of Sivia.  Emiliano, according to his goals, has worked for 11 years growing coffee and cacao on his plot of farmland located in the community of Chuvivana, while his beloved wife works selling groceries.

Emiliano works growing cacao, for which he needs the help of two permanent farmworkers who always work for him.  Currently he already has six hectares of cacao of which, thanks to his dedication, his annual harvest gives an average of 2,500 kg. of cacao.  He always feels proud of this quantity and excited about continuing to increase his cacao plants more.

This is his fourth loan with MFP, and he promises to make his payments punctually.  He is happy about having a very close communal bank.

With the 3,500 nuevos soles (PEN) he will increase his cacao plants, for which he will buy more plants and hire farmworkers.

loans.use: to hire farmworkers and to buy cacao plants.

loans.name: Maria Del Consuelo

texts.es:
Sin contar con mucho capital Maria ha montado su propio negocio desde hace aproximadamente 7 años, cuando decidió generar sus propios ingresos y contar con un dinero para contribuir económicamente a los gastos de su hogar. Maria desde entonces viene ofreciendo prendas de vestir a través de catálogos, donde tiene clientes de todo el municipio y ha generado una gran reputación por la buena calidad de sus productos y la buena atención que ofrece. Maria se encuentra casada y tiene 3 hijos a quienes gracias a su trabajo les puede brindar una buena calidad de vida y un estudio de buena calidad. En su negocio, ha podido tener muy buenas ventas y estas vienen aumentando considerablemente en los últimos meses, es por esto que Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de prendas de vestir con las cuales pueda ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes y pueda responder a unos pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.

Maria espera que de esta manera su negocio siga creciendo y siga generando ingresos con los cuales les pueda aportar económicamente para su sostenimiento. Además, Maria sueña con poder tener un gran negocio en el cual pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y desde el cual pueda ofrecer una estabilidad económica y mayores oportunidades de progreso para su familia.
texts.en:
Without much capital, Maria has set up her own business for about 7 years when she decided to generate her own income to contribute financially to the household expenses. Maria has since been offering apparel through catalogs, where she has customers around tow.  She has gained a great reputation for high quality products and offering good service. Maria is married and has 3 children, for whom thanks to her work, she can provide a good quality of life and a good education. In her business, she may have had very good sales and they are increasing significantly in recent months, which is why Maria seeks a loan to give her the ability to buy clothing.   She can then offer a greater variety of products to her customers respond to some requests they have made.

Maria expects to continue growing her business and generating income with which she can contribute financially to sustain them. In addition, Maria dreams of having a great business from which she can create jobs for people in need provide greater economic stability and advancement opportunities for her family.

loans.use: to purchase clothing so that she can offer a greater variety of products to her customers and respond to some of their requests.

loans.name: Rosa Elia

texts.es:
La señora Rosa Elia es madre soltera y tiene una hija bajo su responsabilidad, a quien le quiere dar lo mejor. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para poder pagar los gastos de médicos de una operación que necesita en el brazo izquierdo y comprar el medicamento que necesita para la recuperación, ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para cubrir esta emergencia de salud que requiere. 
Doña Rosa Elia es empleada de una clínica, en el departamento de limpieza, es el ingreso que obtiene para los gastos familiares y escalares de su hija.
texts.en:
Rosa Elia is a single mother with one daughter to care for; she wants to give her the best.

She is asking for a loan to pay for the cost of an operation that she needs on her left arm and to buy medicines for her recovery, because she doesn't have the money she needs to cover the cost of this health emergency.

Rosa Elia works at a clinic on the cleaning crew. Her income pays for the family's costs and her daughter's schooling.

loans.use: with medical costs.

loans.name: Hynoon

texts.en: Hynoon is married and a very responsible father who provides for the needs of his family. Hynoon is requesting a loan of 12,000 PHP to buy materials that he needs in his auto shop to better serve his clients. Hynoon dreams that someday he will give his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy materials to use for his auto shop.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en: Helen C. owns and operates a tailoring business providing general alteration and tailoring services to local community members. She is 55 years old, married and has nine grown-up children. She is from the village of Sto. Domingo. Helen has been in her business for over 15 years and earns PHP 2,000 a month. In the future, Helen hopes that her business is expand to serve the need of her family.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her tailoring business

loans.name: Omar

texts.es:
Omar es una persona que ha tenido que superar muchas adversidades en su vida, en lo cual sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante le han permitido luchar fuertemente contra estas dificultades y continuar progresando junto a su familia. Omar tiene a su cargo 4 hijos, pues su madre los dejó hace un tiempo, y además de esto, desde hace aproximadamente 5 años se quedó sin empleo y se vio en la obligación de buscar la manera de generar ingresos con los cuales pudiera sostener su hogar. Fue así como montó su propio negocio de venta de papas, plátanos fritos los cuales los prepara en un carro y se ubica a las afueras de un colegio durante todo el día. Con esta actividad ha podido generar los ingresos que requiere para el sostenimiento de su hogar y con lo que ha podido brindarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que su residencia es bastante alejada del colegio donde ofrece sus productos, Omar le ha colocado un motor a su carro para poder transportarlo, sin embargo, en estos momentos su motor se encuentra averiado y no ha tenido los recursos económicos para arreglarlo. Es por esto que Omar busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a realizar la reparación del motor de su carro y poder transportarlo desde su residencia hasta el colegio donde ofrece sus productos.

Omar espera que así pueda seguir trabajando y seguir generando los ingresos con los cuales pueda ofrecer a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida y un estudio de calidad.
texts.en:
Omar is a person who has had to overcome a lot of adversity in his life.  His desire to work and get ahead has allowed him to fight hard against these difficulties and continue making progress with his family.  Omar is responsible for his four children because their mother left them some time ago.  In addition to this, he has been without work for approximately five years and he saw the need to look for a way to generate income with which to support his household.

This was how he set up his own business selling potatoes and fried bananas, which he prepares in a cart and is located outside a school all day.  With this job he has been able to generate the income he needs to support his household and with which he has been able to give his children a better quality of life.

Because his residence is quite far from the school where he sells his products, Omar has put a motor in his cart to be able to transport it.  Nevertheless, right now his motor is broken and he has not had the financial resources to fix it.  For this reason Omar is looking for a loan that will give him the possibility of repairing the motor of his cart and be able to transport it from his residence to the school where he sells his products.

Omar hopes that he can continue working and generate the income with which he can give his children a good quality of life and a quality education.

loans.use: to repair the motor of his cart to be able to transport it from his home to the school where he sells his products.

loans.name: Norma Argentina

texts.es: Norma vive (suburbio Ecuador ). Ella comenzó hace mucho vendiendo artículos de bazar por el motivo de que su esposo la abandono y en ese tiempo sus hijos eran pequeños y no tenia como alimentarlos haci que decidió intalar el bazar. Su trabajo lo realiza por las tardes sola . es casada tiene hijos pero ya mayores . la dificultad que tiene es la inseguridad del sector. A futuro ella anhela poder incrementar el negocio. Con el préstamo comprara utiles escolares, papeleria, cuadernos, vitrinas.
texts.en:
Norma lives in Suburbio, Ecuador.  A long time ago she began selling stationery items because her husband abandoned her.  At that time her children were young and she had no way to feed them, so she decided to set up the stationery store.  She does her work in the afternoon, and she works alone.  She is married and has children who are older now.  The problem she has is the insecurity in the industry.  In the future she wants to expand her business.

With the loan she will buy school supplies, stationery, notebooks, and display cases.

loans.use: to buy school supplies, stationery, notebooks, and display cases.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, membre du groupe de crédit  Riziki Mpya, Femme veuve  dynamique, entrepreneur expérimentée, âgée de 52 ans. Elle est  vendeuse de braises, bananes, etc. Son mari fut inopinément décédé suite à une courte maladie. Elle a commencé son business de lors qu’elle fut mariée. Il ya 3 ans qu’elle  fut informée de micro crédit qu’octroi l’IMF Hekima. Ainsi, elle bénéficia son premier crédit de 50$ pour renforcer  ses affaires. Les bénéfices de son activité servent d’épargne, d’alimentation et d’appui à la scolarité de ses  enfants. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir  son  11eme  crédit. Au cours de la période, cette cliente a vu ses affaires prospèrent positivement. Ainsi elle a  décidé de renouveler son cycle de crédit. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  5 sacs de braises, 4 régimes de bananes.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir confortablement. La cliente remercie Hekima pour  les actions d’autonomisation de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en:
The client is a member of the RIZIKI MPYA group.  She is a dynamic 52-year-old widow and an experienced entrepreneur.  She sells embers, bananas etc..  Her husband passed away unexpectedly after a short illness.

She started her own business right after getting married.  Three years ago she learned that the micro-finance institution Hekima was providing micro-loans.  This is how she obtained her first loan of 50 USD, which allowed her to strengthen her business.  With the profits from her activity she is able to put some money into saving, to feed her children, and to provide for their education.

She has just obtained her eleventh loan.  During that time period, her business has grown positively.  This is why she has decided to request a new loan cycle.  This new loan will be used to buy five bags of embers and four bunches of bananas.  

She would also like to see her children grow comfortably.  She thanks Hekima for its actions in favor of the empowerment of poor women excluded from the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to buy five bags of embers and four bunches of bananas.

loans.name: Richard

texts.fr: Monsieur Richard,marié et âgé de 33 ans a 4 enfants dont le plus âgé a 8 ans le moins âgé a une année. 3 enfants vont à l'école, et a un autre enfant en charge. Son niveau d'éducation est 5 ans de l'école primaire. Il est devenu client de l'ACB en 2007, et est au 19ème cycle de crédit. Tous les crédits antérieurs sont remboursés sans aucun problème.  Le crédit lui octroyé est utilisé dans l'achat des matériaux de construction pour réhabiliter sa maison d'habitation. Après réhabiliter cette maison qui est divisée en deux parties, une partie sera mise en location. Ceci lui permettra d'avoir des revenus additionnels qui lui permetrra d'assurer davangate le bien être de sa famille. Dans le futur, il prévoit demander un crédit pour acheter une moto qui sera utilisée au transport remuneré des personnes. Son ambition pour sa famille est d'acheter une vache pour chacun de ses enfants, ce qui leur permettra d'avoir du lait à boire et à vendre et ça leur procurera les frais scolaires.
texts.en:
Richard, a 33 year old married man, has four children - the eldest is 8 years old, the youngest one. Three of the children attend school, and he also has another dependent child. He completed five years of primary education. He became a client of the ACB in 2007, and this will be his 19th loan with them. All the previous loans have been repaid without any problems. 
The current loan is to be used to purchase construction materials to remodel his home. After remodelling this house, which is divided into two sections, one half will be put up for rent.
This will enable him to earn additional income, which will better enable him to take care of his family. In the future, he intends to request a loan to purchase a motorcycle, which will be used to take passengers on trips they will pay for.
His ambition for the family is to buy a cow for each of his children, which will allow them to have milk to drink and for sale, which will in turn pay for the school fees.

loans.use: to purchase materials to renovate his house (20 planks, 20 insulated gypsum boards, 3 doors, etc)

loans.name: Copaboka 3 Group

texts.fr:
Marie, cultivatrice du riz, fait partie du groupe COPABOKA 3. Ell est âgée de 48 ans, mariée et a 3 enfants dont le plus âgé a 22 ans et le moins âgé a 11 ans. Ses deux enfants vont à l'école et aucune personne n'est en sa charge. Son niveau d'éducation est 6 ans de l'école primaire.

Elle a commencé de travailler avec ACB en 2012, et le cycle actuel est le premier pour elle. Avec le crédit lui octroyé, elle a acheté les angrais chimiques pour son riz et a payé la main d'oeuvre des gens qui ont preparé le champs. Pour accroître son agriculture, elle a une stratégie de demander autres crédit dans le futur, ceci lui permettra d'être très compétente dans le secteur d'agriculture du riz. Avec le profit, elle va assurer l'éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Marie, a rice grower, belongs to the COPABOKA 3 group. She is 48 years old, married and the mother of three children. The oldest is 22 and the youngest is 11. Two of her children go to school, and she has no other dependents. Marie attended school for 6 years at the primary level.

She first collaborated with ACB in 2012, and this is her first loan cycle. With the loan, she has purchased chemical fertilizers for her rice, and paid the workers who prepared the fields. To increase her crop, Marie plans to ask for more loans in the future, which will allow her to become skilled in the rice-growing sector. With the profit, she will pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers and to pay the workers who have prepared her land.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, membre du groupe de crédite Esther, femme  dynamique, ambitieuse, entrepreneur, veuve. Elle est  vendeuse des Boissons et autres articles divers (Omo,biscuits,sels,riz,etc.). Elle s’entraide avec  ses enfants  dans cette affaire. Elle a commencé son business de lors que son époux fut décédé vers les années 2000. Plus tard elle  fut informée de micro crédit qu’octroi l’IMF Hekima, elle bénéficia son premier crédit de 50$ pour renforcer  ses affaires. Les bénéfices de son activité servent d’épargne, d’alimentation et d’appui à la scolarité de ses  enfants. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir  son  9eme  crédit. Au cours de la période, bien que la crise financière semble menacée de tout bord, cette cliente a vu ses affaires prospèrent positivement. Ainsi elle a  décidé d’augmenter son montant de crédit pour ce nouveau cycle. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  10 cassiers de boissons (Fanta, Primus, Coca).En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  les actions d’autonomisation de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en:
The client is a member of the ESTHER group.  She is a dynamic and ambitious widow with an entrepreneur spirit.  She sells drinks and other various items (Omo washing powder, crackers, salt, rice etc...).  Her children help her with her business, which she started after her husband passed away around the year 2000.

Later on, she learned that the micro-finance institution Hekima was granting micro-loans, and she received her first loan of 50 USD, which helped her strengthen her business.  With the profits from her business, she is able to put some money into savings, feed her children and pay for their school fees.  She has now received her ninth loan.  During that period of time, in spite of the looming financial crisis, she has seen her business thrive.  This is why she has decided to request a larger loan amount for this new cycle.  This new loan will help her to purchase 10 crates of drinks (Fanta, Primus, Coca Cola).

She would like to see her children grow.  She thanks Hekima for its action in favor of the empowerment of poor women excluded from the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to pay for ten crates of drinks (Fanta, Primus, Coca Cola).

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, membre du groupe d’affaires Kavira groupe. Femme  dynamique, entrepreneur, âgée de 40 ans, mère de 7 enfants parmi les quels deux enfants n’étudient plus faute de moyens financiers. Elle est  vendeuse des poissons. Son mari est un petit commerçant. Elle a commencé son business avec  un micro crédit de 50$ reçu de l’IMF Hekima. Les bénéfices de son activité servent d’épargne, d’alimentation et d’appui à la scolarité de ses  enfants. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir  son  6eme  crédit. Au cours de la période, cette cliente a vu ses affaires prospèrent positivement. Ainsi elle a  décidé d’augmenter son montant de crédit pour ce nouveau cycle. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  5 paniers de poissons.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir et acheter une maison.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  les actions d’autonomisation de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en:
The client is a member of the Kavira group.  She is a dynamic 40 year-old entrepreneur and the mother of seven children.  Two of her children no longer attend school for lack of financial means.

She sells fish.  Her husband is involved in small retail business.  She started her business with a loan of 50 USD from the micro-finance institution Hekima.  The profits from her activity help her to put some money into savings, to feed her children and pay for their school fees.  

She has now received her sixth loan.  During that time period, she has seen her business thrive.  This is why she has decided to request a larger loan amount for this new cycle.  With this new loan, she will be able to purchase five baskets of fish.  She would also like to see her children grow, and to buy a house.

She thanks Hekima for its action in favor of the empowerment of poor women excluded from the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to buy five baskets of fish.

loans.name: Glarice

texts.fr:
Glarice est une femme âgée de 22 ans. Elle est célibataire.
Glarice travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2011. Elle vend du charbon de bois pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la rupture de stock.
Glarice a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter du charbon de bois. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Glarice voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Glarice is a 22-year-old single woman who has been working as a reseller since 2011.  She sells charcoal from her home to customers from all walks of life.  She buys her merchandise in Lomé and works alone.  At the moment, her main difficulty is that she is out of stock.

Glarice has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy charcoal.  She wants to reinvest in her activity.

In the coming years, Glarice would like to increase the size of her business.  She says that with the profits, she plans to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Songum Tom Yingue Group

texts.fr:
Mr AUGUSTIN  est la représentante du groupe SONGUM TOM YINGUE. Il  est marié et père de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 22ans et le moins âgé a 13ans. Les 03  vont à l’école. Elle a 06 personnes en charge.

Il  est gérant de kiosque   depuis  06ans. Il s’approvisionne  avec les marchands. Ses clients sont  les  jeunes du quartier et les passagers.

Il veut améliorer le cadre de travail en  s’achetant 01 réfrigérateur, 03 tables et 12 chaises.

Il  utilise  ses bénéfices pour agrandir l’activité. Il ambitionne  construire une maison d’habitation.
texts.en:
Augustin is the representative of the the SONGUM TOM YINGUE group.  He is married and the father of four children.  His oldest child is 22 years old and the youngest is 13.  Three of his children attend school.  He is financially responsible for 6 people.

Augustin has been working as a cafe manager for the past six years.  He gets his supplies from retailers.  His clients are young people and travelers.

Augustin would like to improve his workplace by purchasing one refrigerator, three tables and a dozen chairs.

He uses his profits to expand his business. His ambition is to build a house to live in.

loans.use: to buy one refrigerator, three tables and a dozen chairs.

loans.name: El Paraiso Group

texts.es: Juan Lorenzo es miembro del Grupo Solidario El Paraíso, tiene  43 años de edad, es casado y tiene seis hijos de los cuales son estudiantes, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, el señor Juan se dedica a comercializar astillas de ocote, tiene el apoyo de su esposa y sus hijos que son los que le ayudan a desempeñar la labor en su microempresa, son una familia trabajadora y muy unida. Don Juan inicio desde hace dos años su negocio de elaboracion de astillas de ocote ya que le ha resultado  muy rentable, el trabajo lo realizan de 6:00 am a 5:30 pm. El préstamo que don Juan solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de trozos de madera para la elaboración de astillas de ocote. Con el apoyo de este préstamo don Juan podrá hacer crecer su negocio con el cual comprara la materia prima para la elaboración de su producto. Sus metas es que su negocio pueda estar en mejores condiciones, creando un mejor plantel para la elaboración de astillas de ocote y desea que sus hijos puedan llegar a ser profesionales. Tiene 4 ciclos de trabajar con los préstamos de FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas de manera puntual y los préstamos obtenidos le han ayudado a mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Juan Lorenzo is a member of El Paraíso solidarity group.  He is 43 years old and married, with six children who are students.  His wife does domestic work.  Juan works selling kindling of ocote wood.  He has the help of his wife and his children, who are the ones who help him carry out the work in his micro-enterprise.  They are a hardworking and very close family.

Two years ago Juan started his business making ocote kindling, and it has turned out to be very profitable.  He works from 6:00 a.m. to 5:30 p.m.

The loan Juan is requesting is to invest in buying pieces of wood to make ocote kindling.  With the help of the loan Juan will be able to make his business grow, with which he will buy the materials to make his product.

His goal is for his business to be in better condition, creating a better nursery to make ocote kindling.  Also, he wants for his children to be able to become professionals.

He has worked with FAMA loans for four cycles and he has made his payments punctually.  The loans have helped him to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy pieces of wood.

loans.name: Ramon Elias

texts.es:
Ramón es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y esto le ha permitido superar las grandes adversidades que le ha presentado la vida. Ramón se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos de 4 y 7 años de edad a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de ingresar a una educación de calidad. Ramón es agricultor y desempeñó esta actividad durante gran parte de su vida, sin embargo, las pocas oportunidades a las que tenía acceso hicieron que abandonara esta actividad y decidió montar una tienda general donde ofrece toda clase de productos de la canasta familiar. Desde este negocio ha tenido la oportunidad de brindar a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso, y es por esto que quiere buscar la manera de que siga creciendo. Con el ánimo de surtir su negocio, Ramón busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar y así ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.

Ramón espera que su negocio salga adelante y les siga brindando a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso. Además, Ramón sueña con poder tener su propio local donde ubicar su tienda y no tener que pagar los altos costos del arriendo por esta.
texts.en:
Ramón is a person who has always been very hard working and this has allowed him to rise above the big adversities that life has presented. Ramón is married and has 2 children, who are 4 and 7 years old. He has always wanted to offer them a good quality of life and better opportunities to get a quality education. Ramón is a farmer and he has been in this business for most of his life. However, the few opportunities that he had access to made him abandon that activity and he decided to open a general store where he offers all kind of basic products that families need. With this business he has been able to provide his children a good quality of life and better opportunities for progress. This is why he wants to find a way to keep growing. With an eye to stocking his business, Ramón is looking for a loan to will provide him the opportunity to buy basic products for the family so that he can offer a greater variety of products to his customers.

Ramón hopes his business will come out ahead and continue providing his children with a better quality of life and more opportunities for making progress. Ramón also dreams of having his own place to locate his store and not having to pay the high cost of rent.

loans.use: to buy basic products for the family so that he can offer a greater variety of products to his customers.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.es: Eusebio de 38 años de edad convive con modesta de 42 años fruto de  esta relación tienen 3 hijos. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicado en la asociación de vista alegre en el distrito de Sivia. Eusebio es un hombre perseverante y solidario, él se dedica al cultivo de cacao, asimismo compra productos agrícolas como cacao, café y achiote desde hace 5 años. Cuenta que todo le va muy bien en su trabajo, el único inconveniente que tiene es no contar con movilidad propia, por lo que esto hace que el costo del flete sea muy elevado.
